Up.Statement:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_Payment] WHERE [payment_id] = 'K36') BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[w2_Payment] ([shop_id] ,[payment_group_id] ,[payment_id] ,[payment_alt_id] ,[payment_name] ,[payment_name_mobile] ,[payment_price_kbn] ,[payment_price] ,[usable_price_min] ,[usable_price_max] ,[mobile_disp_flg] ,[display_order] ,[valid_flg] ,[del_flg] ,[date_created] ,[date_changed] ,[last_changed] ,[user_management_level_not_use]) VALUES( '0' ,'' ,'K36' ,'' ,'NP後払い' ,'' ,0 ,0 ,1 ,999999 ,'0' ,110 ,'0' ,'0' ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,'ｗ２ユーザー' ,'0') END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_PaymentPrice] WHERE [payment_id] = 'K36') BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[w2_PaymentPrice] ([shop_id] ,[payment_group_id] ,[payment_id] ,[payment_price_no] ,[tgt_price_bgn] ,[tgt_price_end] ,[payment_price] ,[del_flg] ,[date_created] ,[date_changed] ,[last_changed]) VALUES( '0' ,'' ,'K36' ,'1' ,0 ,0 ,200 ,'0' ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,'ｗ２ユーザー') END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_DeliveryCompany' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'delivery_company_type_post_np_payment') ALTER TABLE w2_DeliveryCompany ADD delivery_company_type_post_np_payment [nvarchar] (100) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); GO
